2012-03-31.snippet: Finance ministers from the European countries that use the currency hope the new fund will show their determination to end the two-year-old euro crisis....
2012-03-31.lead_paragraph: Finance ministers from the European countries that use the currency hope the new fund will show their determination to end the two-year-old euro crisis.
2012-03-31.abstract: European finance ministers agree to create a permanent bailout fund for the euro zone which will be able to disburse up to 800 billion euros, or about $1 trillion; officials hope announcement will reaffirm their determination to put the two-year-old euro crisis behind them, but questions persist about whether the fund will be sufficient to deal with multiple crises.

headline.main: Europe Agrees to Bailout Fund for Euro of Over $1 Trillion
headline.print_headline: Officials Reach Agreement on Euro Zone Bailout Fund
